      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_34b8e6a6ff8e3c77459b7bacb13300f7da8b8aa0</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Detecting ammonium ions using sodium hydroxide solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entdecken der Ammoniumionen mit 
Natriumhydroxidlösung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détecter des ions d'ammonium en utilisant la 
solution d'hydroxyde de sodium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Detectando íons do ammonium usando a solução do 
hydroxide do sodium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rilevazione degli ioni dell'ammonio usando la 
soluzione dell'idrossido del sodio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανίχνευση των ιόντων αμμωνίου που χρησιμοποιούν τη 
λύση υδροξειδίου νατρίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Detección de los iones del amonio usando la 
solución del hidróxido del sodio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing experiments performed to test for the presence of ammonium ions in a test solution. This shows that the addition of sodium hydroxide solution to the ammonium compound produces ammonia gas which can be smelled.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammonium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammonium sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">detection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">smell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen führte das Zeigen von 
von Experimenten durch, um auf das Vorhandensein der Ammoniumionen in 
einer Testlösung zu prüfen. Dieses zeigt, daß die 
Hinzufügung der Natriumhydroxidlösung zum Ammoniummittel Ammoniakgas
produziert, welches gerochen werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations montrer des 
expériences a exécuté pour déterminer la présence des ions 
d'ammonium dans une solution d'essai. Ceci prouve que l'ajout de
la solution d'hydroxyde de sodium au composé d'ammonium produit le 
gaz d'ammoniaque ce qui peut être senti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações mostrar 
experiências executou para testar para a presença de íons do 
ammonium em uma solução do teste. Isto mostra que a adição 
da solução do hydroxide do sodium ao composto do ammonium produz o 
gás da amônia qual pode ser cheirado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni mostrare gli 
esperimenti ha effettuato per esaminare a presenza degli ioni 
dell'ammonio in una soluzione della prova. Ciò indica che 
l'aggiunta della soluzione dell'idrossido del sodio al residuo 
dell'ammonio produce il gas dell'ammoniaca quale può essere sentito 
l'odore di.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν πειράματα που 
εκτελούνται για να εξετάσουν για την παρουσία ιόντων αμμωνίου σε 
μια λύση δοκιμής. Αυτό δείχνει ότι η προσθήκη της λύσης 
υδροξειδίου νατρίου στην ένωση αμμωνίου παράγει την αμμωνία που 
αέριο μπορεί να μυριστεί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones mostrar experimentos 
se realizó para probar para la presencia de los iones del amonio en 
una solución de la prueba. Esto muestra que la adición de la 
solución del hidróxido del sodio al compuesto del amonio produce el 
gas del amoníaco cuál puede ser olido.</string>
          </description>
